edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_project

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_project.Square
      • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_project.Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Room
extends Square
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is a Square that represents a room in the game. The room can either be clear or it can contain the briefcase.
    See Also:
